cast.overview: A twelve-man team at a remote Antarctic research station discovers an alien buried in the snow for over 100,000 years. Soon unfrozen, the form-changing creature wreaks havoc, creates terror...And becomes one of them.
cast.title: The Thing

details.biography: Jed (born 1977) was an animal actor. He was a Vancouver Island wolf-Alaskan Malamute hybrid. Despite having only a few roles, he made an impact within the film industry.  He was trained by Clint Rowe, who was involved in the films that Jed was cast in and was also associated with the film Turner and Hooch. After filming Disney's sequel to White Fang, Jed permanently remained with Rowe in Acton, California, until his death in June 1995.
details.name: Jed
